bio: Music producer and project manager releasing onchain since 2020.
contributionDescription: I am a recipient of the initial airdrop as I have been an avid user since the protocol's early days. I currently release music on an Optimism-based application called Sound.xyz. Besides my own work, I assist new artists in guidance on release schedule and marketing of on-chain music, and I am looking to receive a grant to invest in new projects to be launched via Optimism. This includes both production and marketing fees.

contributionLinks.description: Free release of the project 'Sinaloa - Up'
Release of the project "2222" with 5 Tone

impactDescription: I have been releasing several projects on Optimism which are music NFTs launched on the Optimism dapp Sound.xyz. Besides my own project, Kristoph Galland - I am also helping managing artists such as FRVR, 5 Tone and Dash & Preuss via my record label DYSAUX.
pwCategorySuggestions: NFTs, Smart Contract Platforms, Blockchain Infrastructure, Decentralized Finance, Digital Identity
